TopicTitle: How to set up a solar panel in Unity?

Articles.Content: I'm making a part that contains solar panels, and ModuleDeployableSolarPanel needs a secondary transform called suncatcher in the config I checked. I've tried googling it but all the tutorials are inaccessible. How do I set up a suncatcher in Unity? Is there any other thing I need to do in Unity to make a solar panel? Thanks.

I created a number of part projects including the Blender and Unit projects - one is a solar panel - so people could open the project and see how it was put together.
